channel.title: Project εvøℒusion™
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt][shadow=teal,left]εvøℒusion[/shadow]™[/size][/b]
--- [center][size=27pt][b]Let us bring Evolution, mix it with Illusion and we get the new Era of Gaming; [shadow=red,left]εvøℑllusions[/shadow]™[/b][/size]
Base(s): Project Insanity(cleaned). [hr]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/a3l7gy.jpg[/img][/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Our Aim[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donation]Info[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]The Applying Layout[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credit[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [shadow=blue,left]!STAY POSTED MORE UPDATES TO COME![/shadow] [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Nobody's perfect, we all have made mistakes and asked questions. But only a few of us put forth the effort to Get what you want, to Make what we need, and to follow it though to the finish!. If you're not one of the very few, leave this page now. But if by a small chance in hell you are, then Join Me, and we will work TOGETHER to be the Best of the Best! Don't miss out on your one chance to shine..
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] We are a group of individuals dedicated in making the best of gaming experience for the worlds [i]Lovely[/i] RSPS players. We strive to make ours better, we strive to help out with others, because in the long run. Everyone know if your not apart of the εvø community then your just øvεrlyStupid.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Our Aim[/b][/size] We aim to be the Best of the Best by 2014, that gives us one year. All we need is for you guys to join in with our Grand Opening on January 1st 2013.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=donation]4.0 - Info[/b][/size] All of the donations we receive from this server will be put forth into making the server/forums better quality for the players,. more information will be said about this come New Years.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=applying]5.0 - The Applying Layout[/b][/size]
Here is the layout:
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: Skype?: What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [/code] [ul][center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Entertainers:
[b]0/2[/b]
Person 1 Person 2
Coders:
[b]0/6[/b]
Client [shadow=red,left]εvøℑllusions™ Person 1 Person 2 Person 3
Server [shadow=teal,left]εvøℒusion[/shadow]™ Person 4 Person 5 Person 6
Graphical Designers:
[b]0/2[/b]
Person 1 Person 2
BETA Testers:
[b]0/10[/b]
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 Person 5 Person 6 Person 7 Person 8 Person 9 Person 10
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=credit]7.0 - Credits[/b][/size]
The [url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Stay+Posted!+Grand+opening+on+New+Years+2013!!][shadow=red,left]εvøℑllusion[/shadow]™ ,[/url] MoeFromRS(bace), X-J-K-X, [shadow=teal,left]εvøLusion[/shadow]. The Moparscape Community, for helping me with some of my own problems. Thanks Guys =D.[/ul]

item.title: Project εvøℒusion™
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

OP hasn’t been on for almost a month, thread is 2 months old, you’re all wasting your time posting.

Read full topic

item.title: Project εvøℒusion™
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Entertainer

I’ve never heard of such a Staff position. Your attitude won’t get you very far in this community by the way - I’m just saying.

EDIT: Your entire Staff list is strange in my opinion.

6.0 - Staff List

Entertainers:

0/2

Person 1
Person 2

Coders:

0/6

Client εvøℑllusions™
Person 1
Person 2
Person 3

Server εvøℒusion™
Person 4
Person 5
Person 6

Graphical Designers:

0/2

Person 1
Person 2

BETA Testers:

0/10

Person 1
Person 2
Person 3
Person 4
Person 5
Person 6
Person 7
Person 8
Person 9
Person 10

  1. Six Programmers probably won’t work out, and will generate more of a mess than a Private Server.
  2. Graphic Artists don’t deserve a Staff Rank. It’s silly to say that they do. Give them a Forum Icon or something.
  3. Ten Beta-Phase testers aren’t enough in my opinion. You should open up the list to at least 50.

P.S. I am NOT saying this to be mean, or to belittle your Server or what you’ve done. This is constructive criticism and feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: Project εvøℒusion™
item.dc:creator: @Slant Slant
item.description:
@Slant wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:463703”][ul][quote author=EvoIllusions link=topic=567316.msg4123817#msg4123817 date=1350142277]

Why do you put your stupid little signature image up everywhere? We don’t know you, you are a nobody, stop trying to act like we care, because we don’t.
[/quote]I’m one in 10 billion, and so are you.
You will know, in good time.
For you are not my friend, I share no secrets with. I hope you crumble and die, and parish by the Devils almighty dick.
Let God be with you young one.

You want him to die by the devil, but want god to be with him. What a backwards ass statement.

The [shadow=red,left]εvøℑllusion[/shadow]™ , MoeFromRS(bace), X-J-K-X, [shadow=teal,left]εvøLusion[/shadow].
The Moparscape Community, for helping me with some of my own problems.
Thanks Guys =D.[/ul]

You spelled “base” wrong.
Oh, and I’d like to see some legal documentation of you owning the word “Evolusion”, or “EvoIllusion”. Seeing as you use both in the topic, and can’t seem to pick which one is the server’s name. If you have none, we can get you in trouble for fraudulence. So please take the “TM” off all your shit. Oh, and the colors with shading just looks horrid, it’s like being raped in both eyes by dicks covered in lemon juice and a dash of habanero juice. Oh and what the hell is an entertainer for a staff member? Just some idiot that goes around and distracts people for a few? That’s what the game is for, to distract you from actual productivity. I mean if I wanted an entertainer, I’d just go watch you fail a bit more. Oh, and for taking time if your threads, you also have an extra ending list tag at the end there. plus, I’m sure 98% of the people didn’t notice your link on the bold, colored, shadowed text. You might need someone that’s a bit more advanced at web design, or even just better at posting, to fix this trash thread. Like everyone else. Why the love is your server name EVERYWHERE. Where the love is the content? Is your server all about the name, and how many idiotic images you can make of it? If so, I believe this is the wrong section.
Thank you and have a good night/morning/what ever it is where you presume to live.[/quote]

I actually just cried of laughter. GF Evodickf uck

Read full topic

item.title: Project εvøℒusion™

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Why do you put your stupid little signature image up everywhere? We don’t know you, you are a nobody, stop trying to act like we care, because we don’t.
[/quote]I’m one in 10 billion, and so are you.
You will know, in good time.
For you are not my friend, I share no secrets with. I hope you crumble and die, and parish by the Devils almighty dick.
Let God be with you young one.[/quote]
You want him to die by the devil, but want god to be with him. What a backwards ass statement.

[quote=“EvoIllusions, post:1, topic:463703”]The [shadow=red,left]εvøℑllusion[/shadow]™ , MoeFromRS(bace), X-J-K-X, [shadow=teal,left]εvøLusion[/shadow].
The Moparscape Community, for helping me with some of my own problems.
Thanks Guys =D.[/ul][/quote]
You spelled “base” wrong.
Oh, and I’d like to see some legal documentation of you owning the word “Evolusion”, or “EvoIllusion”. Seeing as you use both in the topic, and can’t seem to pick which one is the server’s name. If you have none, we can get you in trouble for fraudulence. So please take the “TM” off all your shit. Oh, and the colors with shading just looks horrid, it’s like being raped in both eyes by dicks covered in lemon juice and a dash of habanero juice. Oh and what the hell is an entertainer for a staff member? Just some idiot that goes around and distracts people for a few? That’s what the game is for, to distract you from actual productivity. I mean if I wanted an entertainer, I’d just go watch you fail a bit more. Oh, and for taking time if your threads, you also have an extra ending list tag at the end there. plus, I’m sure 98% of the people didn’t notice your link on the bold, colored, shadowed text. You might need someone that’s a bit more advanced at web design, or even just better at posting, to fix this trash thread. Like everyone else. Why the fuck is your server name EVERYWHERE. Where the fuck is the content? Is your server all about the name, and how many idiotic images you can make of it? If so, I believe this is the wrong section.
Thank you and have a good night/morning/what ever it is where you presume to live.

Read full topic

P.S. It’s clear that you have no style or class.

[size=2][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
Nobody’s perfect, we all have made mistakes and asked questions. But only a few of us put forth the effort to Get what you want, to Make what we need, and to follow it though to the finish!. If you’re not one of the very few, leave this page now.
But if by a small chance in hell you are, then Join Me, and we will work TOGETHER to be the Best of the Best! Don’t miss out on your one chance to shine…

__________________________________________________________________________

[size=2][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/size]
We are a group of individuals dedicated in making the best of gaming experience for the worlds Lovely RSPS players. We strive to make ours better, we strive to help out with others, because in the long run. Everyone know if your not apart of the εvø community then your just øvεrlyStupid.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=aim]3.0 - Our Aim[/size]
We aim to be the Best of the Best by 2014, that gives us one year. All we need is for you guys to join in with our Grand Opening on January 1st 2013.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=donation]4.0 - Info[/size]
All of the donations we receive from this server will be put forth into making the server/forums better quality for the players,.
more information will be said about this come New Years.
